com.github.vbauer.houdini.service

Interface ObjectConverterRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ObjectConverterRegistryImpl

    public interface ObjectConverterRegistry
    Registry to store information about available converters.
    Author:
    Vladislav Bauer

      • findConverter

        <R> ObjectConverterInfoValue<R> findConverter(Class<R> resultClass,
                                            Object... sources)
        Find converter in the registry.
        Type Parameters:
        R - type of the result class
        Parameters:
        resultClass - class of result/output parameter
        sources - array with classes for input parameters
        Returns:
        information about available converter or MissedObjectConverterException otherwise
